6 Make sure that the birthing area is clean, so as to prevent infection. 
/circle6 See to it that the room where the delivery is to take place is warm and draught-free, and 
the temperature is between 25°C and 28°C.
/circle6 Encourage the woman to empty her bladder fr equently. Remind her to pass urine every 
two hours or so. 
/circle6 Th  e presence of a second person or a birth companion of the woman's choice, in addition
